snippet: “Good News!” a 1927 musical comedy adapted Jeremy Desmon and being presented at the Goodspeed Opera House, combines all the trademarks of shows from that era.
abstract: Sylviane Gold reviews musical Good News!, adapted by Jeremy Desmon from book by Lawrence Schwab, B G DeSylva and Frank Mandel, with music and lyrics by DeSylva, Lew Brown and Ray Henderson, at the Goodspeed Opera House; Ross Lekites, Lindsay O'Neil, Chelsea Morgan Stock and Tessa Faye star (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: “Good News!” a 1927 musical comedy adapted Jeremy Desmon and being presented at the Goodspeed Opera House, combines all the trademarks of shows from that era.

headline.seo: A Review of ‘Good News!’ in East Haddam
headline.main: A Tale of College, Romance and the Big Game
headline.print_headline: A Tale of College, Romance and the Big Game
